summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley between Boylston Avenue North and Franklin Avenue North, from East Newton Street to East Lynn Street; being the alley in Blocks 1 and 10, Greene's Addition; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6490 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds" and declaring an emergency.
